body:
All,
I've just uploaded the last of the presentations, including replacing
presentation that had pdf export artifacts.  Greg's photos have also been
posted.  If anyone else has photos they'd like to share, send them to me
and I can add them.


There are now zip files so you can download all the presentations at once.


Andy








On Sun, Sep 16, 2012 at 9:45 PM, Guglielmetti, Robert <
